description.zh-cn: 中国四川省省会、副省级市、国家中心城市，中国西部地区的物流、商贸、金融、科技、文化、教育中心及交通、通信枢纽。
description.en: The capital of Sichuan Province, a sub-provincial city, a national central city, and a logistics, trade, financial, technological, cultural, and educational center, as well as a transportation and communication hub in Western China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国共产党成都市委员会书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Secretary of the Chengdu Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党成都市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党成都市委员会
en: Chengdu Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在成都市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Chengdu.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任成都市人民代表大会常务委员会主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Chengdu Municipal People's Congress.

nodes.id: 成都市人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 成都市人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the Chengdu Municipal People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 成都市的国家权力机关。
description.en: The organ of state power in Chengdu.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任成都市人民政府市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Mayor of the Chengdu Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 成都市的国家行政机关。
description.en: The state administrative organ of Chengdu.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国人民政治协商会议成都市委员会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Chairman of the Chengdu Municipal Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议成都市委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议成都市委员会
en: Chengdu Municipal Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议在成都市的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference in Chengdu.

description.zh-cn: 中国战国时期纵横家、外交家和谋略家，曾为秦国相国。
description.en: A strategist, diplomat, and theorist of the School of Diplomacy during the Warring States period of ancient China. He served as the chancellor of the state of Qin.

description.zh-cn: 中国战国时期水利家，秦国蜀郡郡守，主持修建都江堰。
description.en: A hydraulic engineer of the Warring States period in ancient China. He served as an administrator of Shu Commandery for the state of Qin and oversaw the construction of the Dujiangyan irrigation system.

location.zh-cn: 四川省成都市都江堰市

description.zh-cn: 中国古代建设并使用至今的大型水利工程，被誉为“世界水利文化的鼻祖”。
description.en: An ancient irrigation system in China, which has been in use since its construction and is honored as the 'ancestor of the world's hydro-culture'.

description.zh-cn: 位于四川盆地西部，是中国西南地区最大的平原。
description.en: Located in the west of the Sichuan Basin, it is the largest plain in Southwest China.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期蜀汉开国皇帝。
description.en: The founding emperor of the state of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms period.

description.zh-cn: 中国三国时期西南部的政权，由刘备建立。
description.en: A state in southwestern China during the Three Kingdoms period, founded by Liu Bei.

description.zh-cn: 明末农民起义领袖，大西政权的建立者。
description.en: A leader of a peasant revolt in the late Ming dynasty and the founder of the Daxi regime.

description.zh-cn: 明末张献忠建立的农民政权。
description.en: A peasant regime established by Zhang Xianzhong at the end of the Ming Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 清末四川省反对清政府将已告商办的川汉、粤汉铁路路权收归“国有”的群众运动，是辛亥革命的导火索。
description.en: A mass movement in Sichuan province in the late Qing dynasty against the government's nationalization of the commercially operated Sichuan-Hankou and Guangdong-Hankou railways, which became a catalyst for the Xinhai Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 清末官员，曾任四川总督，在保路运动中镇压民众。
description.en: An official in the late Qing dynasty who served as the Viceroy of Sichuan and suppressed the people during the Railway Protection Movement.

description.zh-cn: 推翻中国最后一个帝制王朝清朝的革命。
description.en: The revolution that overthrew China's last imperial dynasty, the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期川军将领，四川省主席。
description.en: A general of the Sichuan Army during the Republic of China period and the Chairman of Sichuan Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期川军将领，后任西康省主席。
description.en: A general of the Sichuan Army during the Republic of China period, later served as the Chairman of Xikang Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治家、军事家，曾任中华民国总统。
description.en: A Chinese politician and military leader who served as the President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治家，蒋介石之子，曾任中华民国总统。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, son of Chiang Kai-shek, who served as President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国时期一场由毛泽东发起和领导的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement in the People's Republic of China launched and led by Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政府在中国中西部地区的13个省、自治区进行的一场以战备为指导思想的大规模国防、科技、工业和交通基本设施建设。
description.en: A large-scale construction of national defense, science and technology, industrial, and transportation infrastructure guided by war preparedness, carried out by the government of the People's Republic of China in 13 provinces and autonomous regions in central and western China.

description.zh-cn: 1981年7月发生在中国四川省的一次特大洪水，对包括成都在内的地区造成了严重破坏。
description.en: A catastrophic flood that occurred in Sichuan Province, China in July 1981, causing severe damage to areas including Chengdu.

description.zh-cn: 2008年5月12日发生在中国四川省的大地震，对成都造成了严重影响。
description.en: A major earthquake that occurred in Sichuan Province, China on May 12, 2008, which had a severe impact on Chengdu.

description.zh-cn: 中国江苏省下辖地级市，唐代时商贸繁荣，与成都齐名。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Jiangsu Province, China, which was a prosperous commercial center during the Tang Dynasty, comparable to Chengdu.

description.zh-cn: 法国南部城市，是成都在海外的第一个友好城市。
description.en: A city in southern France, which is Chengdu's first sister city abroad.

description.zh-cn: 中国唐代伟大的现实主义诗人，被后世尊为“诗圣”。曾在成都居住，其故居杜甫草堂成为著名景点。
description.en: A great realist poet of the Tang Dynasty in China, revered by later generations as the 'Poet-Sage'. He once lived in Chengdu, and his former residence, the Du Fu Thatched Cottage, has become a famous scenic spot.

relationships.target: 中国共产党成都市委员会
成都市人民代表大会常务委员会
中国人民政治协商会议成都市委员会

description.zh-cn: 秦国张仪按首都咸阳建制修筑成都城墙。
description.en: Zhang Yi of the Qin state constructed the city walls of Chengdu modeled after the capital, Xianyang.

description.zh-cn: 时任蜀郡郡守的李冰主持修建了都江堰水利工程。
description.en: Li Bing, then administrator of Shu Commandery, presided over the construction of the Dujiangyan irrigation system.

description.zh-cn: 都江堰水利工程使成都平原沃野千里，成为“天府之国”。
description.en: The Dujiangyan irrigation system transformed the Chengdu Plain into a fertile land, earning it the name 'Land of Abundance'.

description.zh-cn: 刘备在成都称帝，建立蜀汉政权。
description.en: Liu Bei proclaimed himself emperor in Chengdu and established the Shu Han regime.

description.zh-cn: 张献忠率军攻入成都，自立为帝，国号大西。
description.en: Zhang Xianzhong led his army into Chengdu, proclaimed himself emperor, and established the Daxi dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 张献忠在战火中焚毁了成都全城，并屠城。
description.en: Zhang Xianzhong burned down the entire city of Chengdu in the flames of war and carried out a massacre.

description.zh-cn: 时任四川总督赵尔丰镇压保路运动民众，造成“成都血案”。
description.en: Zhao Erfeng, then Viceroy of Sichuan, suppressed the participants of the Railway Protection Movement, causing the 'Chengdu Bloodbath'.

description.zh-cn: 成都的保路运动直接导致了辛亥革命的总爆发。
description.en: The Railway Protection Movement in Chengdu directly led to the outbreak of the Xinhai Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 刘湘在蒋介石支持下，与刘文辉爆发战争并获胜，成为四川最大的实力派。
description.en: With the support of Chiang Kai-shek, Liu Xiang fought a war against Liu Wenhui and won, becoming the most powerful figure in Sichuan.

description.zh-cn: 刘湘与刘文辉爆发争夺四川统治权的战争。
description.en: Liu Xiang and Liu Wenhui fought a war for control of Sichuan.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，成都发生频繁的帮派武斗，是全国最严重的武斗地区之一，社会经济发展遭受了严重的挫折。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Chengdu experienced frequent factional armed conflicts, making it one of the most severely affected areas in the country, and its social and economic development suffered serious setbacks.

description.zh-cn: 三线建设在西南地区的全面展开，带动了成都各项事业的发展，极大地增强了成都的科研和经济实力。
description.en: The full-scale implementation of the Third Front construction in Southwest China drove the development of various undertakings in Chengdu, greatly enhancing its scientific research and economic strength.

description.zh-cn: 1981年的特大洪水使成都受灾严重。
description.en: The catastrophic flood of 1981 caused severe damage to Chengdu.

description.zh-cn: 汶川大地震中，成都部分市县损失惨重，造成数千人遇难。
description.en: In the Wenchuan earthquake, some cities and counties in Chengdu suffered heavy losses, resulting in thousands of deaths.

description.zh-cn: 唐代成都商贸繁荣，与扬州齐名，时有“扬一益二”之称。
description.en: During the Tang Dynasty, Chengdu was a prosperous commercial center, comparable to Yangzhou, and was known as 'Yangzhou first, Chengdu second'.

description.zh-cn: 成都同法国蒙彼利埃结为友好城市（姐妹城市）。
description.en: Chengdu established a sister city relationship with Montpellier, France.

description.zh-cn: 唐代大诗人杜甫曾旅居成都，其故居杜甫草堂成为成都重要的文化地标。
description.en: The great Tang Dynasty poet Du Fu once lived in Chengdu, and his former residence, the Du Fu Thatched Cottage, has become an important cultural landmark in the city.
